thread.title: Hockey player taps puck to himself then smashes goal like it was a home run
thread.title_full: Hockey player taps puck to himself then smashes goal like it was a home run

author: Pat Iversen
title: Hockey player taps puck to himself then smashes goal like it was a home run
text:
More like Jared SpurGOAT. 
By all accounts, Minnesota Wild defenseman Jared Spurgeon is enjoying a terrific season in his own end. 
But it was his offensive abilities on display on Tuesday. Possibly the greatest offensive abilities ever, if we’re being hyperbolically honest. 
The Wild had a power play opportunity against the Devils and the—oh whatever, just watch this. 
The Minnesota Twins called. They’re looking for a shortstop.
